56.heading: Wagner, Melinda.
56.title: "Psychiatrist at the Drawing Board"
56.author: by Melinda Wagner
notes: Article on Nick Dallis (a.k.a. Dal Curtis and Paul Nichols), with photographs of Dallis and his family, and artists Frank Edginton and Marvin Bradley. Describes his writing of Rex Morgan M.D., Judge Parker, and Apartment 3-G. Mentions artists Alex Kotzky, Dan Heilman, and Harold LeDoux.
Color cover by Bob Brunton, features six Dallis characters with a photo of Dallis.
Cover title: "A Psychiatrist Creates Comic Strip Characters."
